DPRK Foreign Minister Leaves for Ministerial Meeting
    Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, left here Saturday to participate in the 12th ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum to be held in Laos.
 He will also visit Thailand and Laos.    
 He was seen off at the airport by Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned, and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao charge d'affaires a.i. here.

articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Mauritius
    Pyongyang, July 23 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Madan Murlidhar Dulloo on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, International Trade and Cooperation of Mauritius.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and develop in different fields, the message wished him a great success in his work.
